title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Q-Learning Application in Online Evolutionary Control-Based Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of Q-learning algorithms and the design procedures for online evolutionary control systems.
Learners can implement and evaluate the performance of a stabilized Q-learning algorithm for a given environmental model.
Learners can produce project outcomes applying online evolutionary control techniques to real-world language processing cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
